WorkItem.Description: Out of the box, WCF supports UserName/WindowsAuth/Certificate/etc for client credentials, but sometimes you need to pass more information.  What is the best way to pass a custom credential type to a WIF-based STS using WCF?
WorkItem.Summary: Custom Credential Type in Active Claims using WIF

Comments.Message:
